name: Somer's Vegan Cream of Mushroom Soup
description: This Vegan Cream of Mushroom soup is creamy and delicious. Ready within 30 minutes. Vegan, gluten-free , oil-free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 Cup raw cashews (soak for a few hours if you don't have a power blender)

recipeInstructions.text: Saute the onions and garlic in a bit of veggie broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Saute the onions and garlic in a bit of veggie broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mushrooms once the onions are transparent. Saute until the mushrooms are reduced in size.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mushrooms once the onions are transparent. Saute until the mushrooms are reduced in size.

recipeInstructions.text: Add veggie broth, herbs and sherry. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add veggie broth, herbs and sherry. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove 2 cups of the hot soup. Blend the soup in a blender with the cashews and nutritional yeast til completely creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove 2 cups of the hot soup. Blend the soup in a blender with the cashews and nutritional yeast til completely creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Return to pot, season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat for five more minutes until slightly thickened.
